image_prompt: A high-quality, photorealistic image inside a modern, clean food manufacturing facility. The tablet screen shows a graph with a predictive maintenance alert. In the background, a stainless steel industrial mixer is visible, with various sensors and clean wiring attached. Both individuals are wearing appropriate PPE: hair nets, safety glasses, and clean lab coats.
